message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a great deal.
I really like the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about meeting halfway at $12,000? That's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet in the middle of our previous offers at $10,500? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
